function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in existing properties","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Installation of state-of-the-art ventilation systems and green retrofitting","Technologies":"State-of-the-art ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for green retrofitting in building modifications","Impact":"Inability to adapt to post-COVID-19 environment with improved safety and sustainability","Mitigation":"Considerations for green retrofitting during building modifications","Technologies":"Green retrofitting solutions","People":"Building designers and architects","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of implementation of Non-Pharmaceutical Interventions (NPIs) in building wellness strategies","Impact":"Failure to slow the spread of contagious diseases within buildings","Mitigation":"Integration of NPIs into building wellness strategies","Technologies":"Non-Pharmaceutical Interventions (NPIs)","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
